conclusion: Coach bus traveling at constant 20 m/s, driver spots puppy at 45 m ahead, reaction time is 0.5s before brakes are applied, bus decelerates uniformly, velocity-time graph is provided
Initial velocity is 20 m/s, velocity remains constant for 0.5s, velocity decreases linearly until it reaches 0, bus stops at around t = 5.5s
Distance traveled during reaction time is 10 m
Distance traveled during deceleration is 50 m
Bus travels 60 m which is greater than the initial 45 m distance to puppy
The puppy is not safe as the bus travels 15 meters beyond the puppy's position
